metadata.name: Boot Loader Is Not Installed On Removeable Media
metadata.description:
The system must not allow removable media to be used as the boot loader. Remove alternate methods of booting the system from removable media. usb0, cd, fd0, etc. are some examples of removeable media which should not exist in the lines: 
set root='hd0,msdos1'
metadata.rationale:
Malicious users with removable boot media can gain access to a system
configured to use removable media as the boot loader.

manual_remediation:
The system must not allow removable media to be used as the boot loader. Remove alternate methods of booting the system from removable media. usb0, cd, fd0, etc. are some examples of removeable media which should not exist in the lines: 
set root='hd0,msdos1'
